title: HoP 290 - Martin Pickavé on Emotions in Medieval Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 290 - Martin Pickavé on Emotions in Medieval Philosophy
description: Martin Pickavé returns to the podcast to talk about theories of the emotions in Aquinas, Scotus and Wodeham.
